basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Churchill Gender and Sexuality Student Scholarship

description: This scholarship was founded by Dr. Lindsey Churchill who is also the founding director of the Women's Research Center and the BGLTQ+ Student Center at UCO. It is awarded to an excelling student(s) with a minor or major in Women's, Gender, and Sexuality Studies. Eligibility Requirements Minimum 2.0 GPA Major or Minor in Women's, Gender, and Sexuality Studies Continuing student for the fall semester that the scholarship is awarded

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
